我的儿子，你出生的那一天，整个暴雪世界都在低语着一个名字——守望先锋2。

　　我骄傲的看着你，一天天长大，发出英雄的召唤。

　　你要记住，我们一直是用智慧与合作，制作新的模式。

　　而我也相信，你会谨慎的，调整英雄微妙的平衡。

　　然而，真正的力量，我的儿子！是分享玩家的快乐！

　　总有一天，我的生命，将抵达终点，而你......

　　将加冕为王！

　　——————守望先锋1

曹尼玛的傻逼东西，暴雪你全家死没了。你这个死婊子，带着你妈的不知道哪里出来的野种滚回来，想找个接手爹。操你妈的快你妈死没了得了，你妈的。

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

什么？这不是守望先锋2啊🙌，这是暴雪木琴的古灰盒，体积小方便携带👍，拆开一包✋😀，放水里就散开，怎么找都找不回来，用来泡水😋😋，冲厕所，拖地都是很好用的😋😋，你看打开以后像奶茶粉一样碎👍✋，放在水里遇水溶解不见，溶解性很强的。冲开以后，是一杯强效加量的洁厕灵，你看它怎么用都用不完👍👍，不掉伤手不伤地，使用一辈子都没问题，大扫除带上它非常方便，用它洗袜子，再拖地板，冲厕所，干净卫生。什么?在哪里买?👆👆右上角寿衣商店，买一盒送一盒😋😋😋😋😋😋

刚接触ow的时候，电脑并不好，但是画质调低仍然可以勉强60帧运行，算是遇到为数不多优化极强的游戏了。虽然暴雪偶尔进行一些脑残的改动，但是基本可以正常游玩。可惜，入坑ow不是时候，没几个月，ow1就关服了，但我仍然在期待着一个更好的ow2。一周后，ow2，带着更高的配置要求，和“全新”的5v5玩法归来。虽然帧数很低，但作为ow1玩家，在二代不用经历繁琐的解锁角色步骤，可以直接游玩，感觉也是挺好的。本以为等以后换了电脑，可以体验到一个更好的ow，然后，国服就关服了，国服玩家们的存档，也都没了。。。
很长一段时间没关注ow，现在ow2登上steam，好家伙，不光存档没了，我号都没了。游戏曾经是好游戏，现在也只是差强人意罢了。前一阵又听说了暴雪的rh事件，怎么说呢，暴雪是真没马，今后无论如何，都不想再碰暴雪的游戏了。傻*暴雪，傻*游戏，狗都不玩
暴雪 你是真他妈逼的死了妈的玩意儿

是的，科比·布莱恩特生于1978年8月23日，出生地是能源城。他的父亲是前机车族战士约翰·布莱恩特，而他的母亲则是直升机和战斗机的混血儿。科比从小就展现出了过人的劈瓜天赋，他的父亲在退役后也一直是他的导师和引导者，帮助他完成劈瓜方面的训练和教育。在1996年中科比被能源城城主选中，从此开始了他的职业战斗生涯，他不仅在战斗中的表现十分出色，在战场下的影响力也是无可挑剔的，是一位非常有创造力的人。曾经自创闪电旋风劈等。他有着非常深厚的劈瓜底蕴和战斗追求，这让他的影响力远远超出了劈瓜这一范畴，但是，2019年底，科比·布莱恩特执行任务的飞行途中遭遇了一场致命的意外。他和其他8位机车族战士一同离世，这场意外震惊了整个世界。他的离去让机车族们深感悲痛和痛惜，能源城也失去了一位不可替代的传奇机车族战士​

我曾经是个英雄，直到有个叫考迪克的朝我脸上扔屎

Played since launch of OW1. OW2, besides being an obvious scam, has been a great disappointment in most aspects. Nothing that ruined the first game and turned away the community has changed. Regardless of the desperation they find themselves in, they continue to employ the same exact practices that drove the community away in record breaking numbers.

Despite the fact that balance changes are (according to devs) made almost exclusively based on high tier meta, the game is still horrifically unbalanced. The devs are actively mad that you are not playing the way they want you to and will gladly take away any enjoyment you had here to fix that. Most changes seem to be based solely on the metric of which hero is being played the least, which can be hard to tell since they have made SO many heroes so un-fun to play. At that, the changes (you'll recognize this if you've played basically any other game from blizzblazz) are always polarized into extremely small and unnoticeable changes to characters that the community has complained about, and game breaking changes to the dev's current favorite that makes competitive borderline unplayable until the "oopsie we're sorry" patch three days later. 

Tanks often invalidate DPS, made worse with the fact that healers are basically expected to pick up some DPS as well. Snipers still dominate at all levels of play thanks to mobility differences and more than half the roster being in one-shot range. Torbjorn is still Torbjorn.
Many heroes are now locked behind paywall, and players are able to enter into competitive with these heroes locked.New heroes can be unlocked in the season they released in by playing a certain amount of hours, but older heroes remain locked if you didn't buy OW1. Combined with the hilariously low requirement to gain access to competitive, low to mid tier ranks are plagued with inexperienced players who do not access to mechanics and strategies players who have paid for characters / been around and had time to unlock them in the battle pass. 

Premium currency in the original game could be gained by getting duplicates from loot boxes that you got for free at every level up, but for the new F2P model they've opted to make the premium currency MUCH more difficult to obtain without purchase. They're charging 15-20 USD for premium shop and league shop exclusive skins.

Any player you asked would have told you that no one wanted a battle pass system but they did it anyway. Content of the battle pass seems to get worse with every season, loosely tied themes and leftover concepts to throw at the players so they'll subscribe to a service that they may or may not even get their money's worth from if they don't put in enough play time and pad our player statistics. This has been made even more evident in the Invasion season where the PVE content is being released episodically, which has proven to be desperate in basically every game ever. 

PVE content, of course, was the main selling point of OW2. In case you haven't heard, they lied about this entirely and have since made an official post backtracking on their promises for story missions and hero levels. DO NOT BE FOOLED - the Invasion update is said to contain "story missions" and "hero progression" but the story missions are they same shitty 4 man co-op mode they made for some events in OW1 like Junkenstein and the hero progression is a sad shadow of what they originally promised us, with the added insult of not tracking any stats retroactively, so they expect us to care enough NOW to level our characters up for a reward of.... nothing.

Truth be told, I was skeptical of the story-based content in the first place, considering the dev team uses every opportunity they can to inject politics into the game at every possible turn, literally releasing short stories about characters with the sole purpose of revealing their sexuality (you can reliably guess that they're not coming out as straight). By now we're all aware that Blizzblazz does not hire good writers or care much about their stories but the quality of those famous cutscenes that this company is widely known for has decreased and the dialogue is a little more cringe than your average Mahvel movie. 

This company has done nothing but lie to you for years. Do not be fooled by this sad, desperate attempt to rebuild a player base that they have hated, admonished, punished, and lied to for years. The playerbase and the league scene are dying for a reason.

[h1] Grass [/h1]

Grass is a type of plant with narrow leaves growing from the base. Their appearance as a common plant was in the mid-Cretaceous period. There are 12,000 species now.

A common kind of grass is used to cover the ground in places such as lawns and parks. Grass is usually the color green. That is because they are wind-pollinated rather than insect-pollinated, so they do not have to attract insects. Green is the best colour for photosynthesis.

Grasslands such as savannah and prairie where grasses are dominant cover 40.5% of the land area of the Earth, except Greenland and Antarctica.

Grasses are monocotyledon herbaceous plants. They include the "grass" of the family Poaceae, which are called grass by ordinary people. This family is also called the Gramineae, and includes some of the sedges (Cyperaceae) and the rushes (Juncaceae). These three families are not very closely related, though all of them belong to clades in the order Poales. They are similar adaptations to a similar life-style.

With about 780 genera and about 12,000 species, the Poaceae is the fifth-largest plant family. Only the Asteraceae, Orchidaceae, Fabaceae and Rubiaceae have more species.

The true grasses include cereals, bamboo and the grasses of lawns (turf) and grassland. Uses for graminoids include food (as grain, shoots or rhizomes), drink (beer, whisky), pasture for livestock, thatch, paper, fuel, clothing, insulation, construction, sports turf, basket weaving and many others.

Many grasses are short, but some grasses can grow tall, such as bamboo. Plants from the grass family can grow in many places and make grasslands, including areas which are very arid or cold. There are several other plants that look similar to grass and are referred to as such, but are not members of the grass family. These plants include rushes, reeds, papyrus and water chestnut. Seagrass is a monocot in the order Alismatales.

Grasses are an important food for many animals, such as deer, buffalo, cattle, mice, grasshoppers, caterpillars and many other grazers. Unlike other plants, grasses grow from the bottom, so when animals eat grass they usually do not destroy the part that grows. This is a part of why the plants are successful. Without grass, soil may wash away into rivers (erosion).

[h1] Evolution of grass [/h1]

Grasses include some of the most versatile plant life-forms. They became widespread toward the end of the Cretaceous. Fossilized dinosaur dung (coprolites) have been found containing grass phytoliths (silica stones inside grass leaves). Grasses have adapted to conditions in lush rain forests, dry deserts, cold mountains and even intertidal habitats, and are now the most widespread plant type. Grass is a valuable source of food and energy for many animals.

[h1] Grass and people [/h1]

Lawn grass is often planted on sports fields and in the area around a building. Sometimes chemicals and water is used to help lawns to grow.

People have used grasses for a long time. People eat parts of grasses. Corn, wheat, barley, oats, rice and millet are cereals, common grains whose seeds are used for food and to make alcohol such as beer.

Sugar comes from sugar cane, which is also a plant in the grass family. People have grown grasses as food for farm animals for about 4,000 years. People use bamboo to build houses, fences, furniture and other things. Grass plants can also be used as fuel, to cover rooves, and to weave baskets.

[h1] Language [/h1]

In English, the word "grass" appears in several phrases. For example:

"The grass is always greener on the other side" means "people are never happy with what they have and want something else".
"Don't let the grass grow under your feet" means "Do something".
"A snake in the grass" is about a person that will not be honest and will trick others.
All flesh is grass: Old Testament book of Isaiah, chapter 40, verses 6–8. A very true observation of the present-day ecology. See the Miocene for the ecological relevance.
Grass is a slang term for cannabis (pot, weed, or marijuana). Cannabis looks like a grass, but it is actually a rosid.

暴雪我操你妈，你妈死了整这出恶心人的东西，登录验证卡半个小时你妈的搞几把呢？你麻痹的傻逼东西谁玩谁傻逼cnm暴雪！以前充的钱就当给你妈烧的纸钱！

六年前，我坐在凉席上，抱着我的小破笔记本第一次打开了守望先锋。当时我只能稳定30帧，开50%渲染，看人都是蓝色或者红色的框框。记得当时特别喜欢死神，半藏和源氏，每天苦练技术，人生第一个全场最佳就是死神的。
        后来找到了本命英雄安娜，从此开始守望男妈妈之旅（bushi）经常看着我们家的源氏在我面前疯狂暗示，于是把激素甩给他看他到底是白给还是乱杀。第一次定级赛完成是黄金2131分，但是我很少打竞技所以最高也只是打到了白金，大概2800分。
        六年来在守望里认识了十几个朋友，有跟我一样的高中大学学生党哥们，有已经工作了好多年的大叔，还有几个声音好听打的也强的小姐姐。我们都是快速玩家，不那么看重输赢，只是享受一起玩的快乐。记得跨年的时候、疫情的时候，大家进了比赛都是公屏祝福或者鼓励其他人，还有一次碰到外挂被我们两边十一个人齐心协力制裁。
        我人生中有差不多四分之一的时间都是在守望先锋的陪伴下度过的，这六年来有欢乐，有不满，无数次怒骂垃圾游戏，无数次又再次打开守望先锋。“我感受到了召唤，我必须回应，一如既往。”
        六年后，我发现守望先锋2要上steam平台，终于等到8月11日游戏正式登陆。我迫不及待的添加入库，下载游戏，打开。
        然后关闭，打开评价，选择不推荐，把这段准备好了的内容复制进去。
        暴雪，柠檬什么时候酸啊！
        这个世界仍需要英雄，但目睹了暴雪睿智行为的我，已经不再需要守望先锋2了，我不想让这个答辩公司的游戏再污染我的回忆。
唉，六年了。
